command.name: add-permission
command.title: Add a set of permissions for an entity in the application's module
command.help: This command adds several permissions for the a new module in the application. The module name is given as argument. Once generated, the module should be registered in the AWA application. It is configured by using an XML file which defines the beans, servlets, filters that it provides. The following files are updated to register the new permissions: src/<project>-<module>-modules.ads
